haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Kurt Wintgens
Ltn Florian Lasch
Ltn Carsten Kantner
Uffz Arnold Bach

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 27/06/1916 near Sampigny.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Rupert Freudenberg of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Jeremy Bretons was killed in action.
Lt Michel Bouvier was killed in action.
Rupert Freudenberg was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Woimbey.
A F.E.2b of Esc 29 was brought down by Rudiger Bretschneider of Jasta 4.
Sergt Emile Labrette was killed in action.
S/Lt Alexandre Lacave was killed in action.
Rudiger Bretschneider was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Sampigny.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.49 was brought down by Uwe Schneider of Jasta 4.
Cpl Felix Leroux was killed in action.
Uwe Schneider was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Pont-A-Mousson.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Lambrecht Steinberg of Jasta 4.
Cne Cornil Chapelant was killed in action.
S/Lt Amede Salomon was killed in action.
Lambrecht Steinberg was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Vienne-le-Chateau.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Baldemar May of Jasta 4.
Sergt Thierry Jean was killed in action.
S/Lt Francis Gayrau was killed in action.
Baldemar May was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Beuvry.
A F.E.2b of No 27 Squadron RFC was brought down by Eberhardt Auch of Jasta 4.
Cpt Abraham Hughes was killed in action.
Lt Bruce Stanbury was killed in action.
Eberhardt Auch was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Camp.
A F.E.2b of Esc 227 was brought down by Sepp Homberg of Jasta 4.
Cpl Gaston Lagarde was killed in action.
Lt Adrien Labarge was killed in action.
Sepp Homberg was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Bully-les-Mines.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of No 1 Squadron RFC was brought down by Lambrecht Tauber of Jasta 4.
Cpt Godwin Williams was killed in action.
Lambrecht Tauber was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Arras.
A F.E.2b of No 16 Squadron RFC was brought down by Gebhard Zinn of Jasta 4.
2nd Lt Vaughan Jarman was killed in action.
Cpt Ives Killingworth was killed in action.
Gebhard Zinn was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Lachalade.
A F.E.2b of Esc 7 was brought down by Lukas Heffter of Jasta 4.
Sergt Emilien Scozzaro was killed in action.
S/Lt Gustave Plateau was killed in action.
Lukas Heffter was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Noyon.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 24 Squadron RFC was brought down by Mario Falck of Jasta 4.
2nd Lt Halden Harbird was killed in action.
Mario Falck was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Beuvry.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Sepp Zuber of Jasta 4.
2nd Lt Evan Lowth was killed in action.
Sepp Zuber was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Guiscard.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Florian Lasch of Jasta 4.
David Norwich was killed in action.
Florian Lasch was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Lachalade.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.65 was brought down by Rupert Puckler of Jasta 4.
Lt Sauveur Lacoste was killed in action.
Rupert Puckler was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 27/06/1916 near Sailly-Laurette.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.62 was brought down by Erhard Weidner of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Ulysse Laborde was killed in action.
Erhard Weidner was  flying a Fokker E.III.


Pilots lost were: 
    Obltn Patrik Schorner: Injured
